validation-missing-fields: Please ensure all fields have been provided
validation-exceeded-maximum-length: Maximum length should not exceed {{maxLength}} characters.
validation-not-exceeded-minimum-length: Minimum length should be at least {{minLength}} characters.
validation-numeric-minimum-number: Please ensure the value is at least {{minimum}}.
validation-numeric-maximum-number: Please ensure the value is no greater than {{maximum}}.
validation-date-in-future: Date must not be in the future
validation-invalid-date: Please ensure a valid date is provided.
validation-day-not-numeric: Day may only be a numeric
validation-month-not-numeric: Month may only be a numeric
validation-year-not-numeric: Year may only be a numeric
